element.name: u_reconciliation_frequency
element.label: Reconciliation frequency
element.hint: Frequency at which the account is reconciled

element.label: Template
element.name: u_template
element.hint: Support tabs and variance calculation in the task are based on this template

element.label: Recon reviewer

element.label: Recon approver

element.hint: User added to this field can approve the task
